response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an extraordinary price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving of $250,000 compared to the standard retail value. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to secure a high-quality asset at a highly favorable price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
